# ***I. SI Session Policy & Procedures***
## ***<u>1. Before the SI Session</u>***
### ***a. You <u>MUST</u> ✓***

1. Bring a ***<u>laptop or tablet</u>*** (including your charger if possible).
2. Have your ***<u> notebook(s) or laptop</u>*** ready to take notes.
3. Come with ***<u>confidence and a positive attitude</u>.***
4. Ensure you have ***<u>access to any relevant course materials</u>***.
5. Be ***<u>on time and prepared to engage actively</u>*** in the session.
6. All of students joining ***<u>VIRTUAL SI SESSION REQUIRED TO OPEN THEIR WEBCAM</u>***.

### ***b. You <u>MUST NOT</u> ❌***

1. Bring ***<u>harmful objects</u>*** (e.g., knife, sword, gun, etc.).
2. Bring ***<u>hot food</u>***  **(if you want to eat hot food, please consume it outside the session. However, I will allow you to eat if you share your food with me and other students!**<p> &#128513; &#128525;  </p>
3. Come with ***<u>angry or upset feelings.</u>***

## ***<u>2. During SI Session</u>***
### ***a. You <u>MUST</u> ✓***

1. Fill out the ***[Check-in Form](https://quangnhatm1.github.io/https-quangnhatm1.github.io-forms/#2_SI_Session_Check-in_Form_2025)*** at the start of session.
2. Actively ***participate and engage*** in the discussion.

3. ***Listen respectfully*** to the SI leader and your peers.

4. ***Ask questions*** if you need clarification or further explanation.

5. ***Collaborate with other students*** to enhance learning.

6. Stay ***focused on the session*** topics and materials.

7. Fill out the ***[Evaluation Form](https://quangnhatm1.github.io/https-quangnhatm1.github.io-forms/#4_Request_Virtual_SI_Session_Form_2025)*** at the end of session.


### ***b. You <u>MUST NOT</u> ❌***

1. ***Distract others*** with side conversations or unrelated activities.

2. Use your device for ***non-session-related activities.***

3. ***Disrupt the session*** by arriving late or leaving early without prior notice.

4. Be ***disrespectful or dismissive*** towards others' contributions.

5. Bring any ***food or drink*** that may cause a distraction or mess **(it is will be OKAY if you share your food/drink with students too! I will very happy with that!)**<p> &#128513; &#128076;  </p>

## ***<u>3. Emergency Situation during SI Session</u>***

> ***IF YOU SEE SOMETHING, SAY SOMETHING!***

### ***You <u>MUST</u> ✓***

1. If you feel ***not well or ill***, please ***inform immediately to SI Leader about your situation.***
2. If ***the room has smoke or fire***, please ***inform immediately to SI Leader or UHDPD (UHD Police Department) or dial 911***.
3. If you ***see suspicious activities*** during SI Session, please ***inform immediately to SI Leader or UHDPD or dial 911***.
